sentences.en: All our chickens are fed on corn.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的鸡都喂玉米。

sentences.en: Corn and cotton are extensively cultivated in this region.
sentences.cn: 这个地区普遍种植玉米和蔬菜.

sentences.en: Corn starch is used as a thickener in stews.
sentences.cn: 玉米淀粉在炖煮菜肴中被用作增稠剂.

sentences.en: Each corn kernel will make a loud pop when cooked.
sentences.cn: 每粒玉米在烹制时都会发出很响的啪的一声。

sentences.en: Fields of corn spread out as far as the eye could see.
sentences.cn: 玉米地延伸到看不到边的地方.

sentences.en: He must not measure his neighbour's corn by his own bushel.
sentences.cn: 他不应该拿自己的标准去衡量邻居.

sentences.en: In the state of Iowa, it's been a bumper year for corn.
sentences.cn: 艾奥瓦州今年玉米大丰收。

sentences.en: Peter and I also did a cabaret at the Corn Exchange.
sentences.cn: 我和彼得也在CornExchange剧院上演了喜剧表演。

sentences.en: The corn has begun to tassel.
sentences.cn: 玉米开始长出穗状雄花.

sentences.en: The corn will come along better if it rains.
sentences.cn: 如果下雨,玉米会长得更好.

sentences.en: The hen ate the grains of corn on the ground.
The scheme offers seed corn finance with loans at only 4% interest.
sentences.cn: 该方案提供种子基金融资，其贷款只收取4%的利息。

sentences.en: There is a lot of good corn land around here.
They are offering farmers $2.15 a bushel for corn.
sentences.cn: 他们向农民出价每蒲式耳2.15美元收购玉米。

sentences.en: This is a romantic ballad that is pure corn.
sentences.cn: 这是一首极为伤感的浪漫小曲.

words.tran_cn: 谷类的；粗野的；陈腐的；乡下味的
角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境
腌；使成颗粒（corn的过去时和过去分词）
垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住
（美）[作物]玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤]鸡眼

phrases.tran_cn: 谷种；播种用的玉蜀黍；可供将来发展的宝贵资源

trans.tran_en: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds
